name: Arnold du Bruin
text: Very quiet, neat and efficient painters, External wall preparation was meticulous with all cracks cut open and properly plastered before painting commenced. Recommend using GM Painting Contractors.

name: Craig Melvill
text: Great advice, great service and always gets the job done. Beaumont PS is extremely happy with GM Painting Contractors and highly recommended them for any Painting, maintenance or building job.

name: Lynne Kleve
text: Extremely happy with the job. Their prep work and attention to detail was excellent. They also finished ahead of schedule. Will definitely recommend.

name: Kimberley Gerhardt
text: Professional, polite, patient with my questions and absolutely skilled at their work. Thank you for the wonderful paint job!

name: Sue Paulus
text: Extremely happy with the service delivered as well as the knowledge, friendliness and approachability of the staff.
